title: Extracting Seizure Control Metrics from Clinic Notes of Patients with Epilepsy: a Natural Language Processing Approach

abstract: Objectives Monitoring seizure control metrics is key to clinical care of patients with epilepsy. Manually abstracting these metrics from unstructured text in electronic health records (EHR) is laborious. We aimed to abstract the date of last seizure and …
